title: Mikel Arteta - Wikipedia
snippet: Arteta has since gone onto become Arsenal's seventh-longest serving manager. Born in San Sebastián, Basque Country, Arteta began his football career at Antiguoko and befriended fellow midfielder Xabi Alonso as they played together every weekend. The two often played along the beaches and gutters ...

title: Arsenal Manager Information | Arsenal Insider
snippet: Arsenal appointed Mikel Arteta as the club’s latest manager in December 2019 with the title of head coach. He returned to the club to replace Unai Emery at the Emirates Stadium helm.
